name: @randy.tarampi/job-application
description: A utility to generate coherent job application (resume + cover letter) packages.

scripts.build:babel: npm run build:babel:esm && npm run build:babel:es5
scripts.cover: rm -rf coverage/ .nyc_output/; NODE_ENV=test nyc gulp -LLLL --color test
scripts.job-application: NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=pdf CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") gulp -LLLL --color job-application
scripts.job-applications: NODE_ENV=printable CAMPAIGN_SOURCE=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").name") CAMPAIGN_MEDIUM=pdf CAMPAIGN_CONTENT=$(node -p "require(\"./package.json\").version") gulp -LLLL --color job-applications
scripts.kill:server: if [ -f /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid ]; then echo "Killing server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid"; kill -9 `cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid`; rm /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid; fi;
scripts.prepare: if [ -z "$IS_PUBLISHING" ]; then npm run build; fi;
scripts.start:server: npm run kill:server; node ./server.js & echo $! > /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid; echo "Started server (`cat /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid`) from /tmp/ca.randytarampi.me.job-application.server.pid";
